main event: On 13 August 1949, a metal object allegedly fell to the pavement at the intersection of Canal and Bourbon Streets in New Orleans, Louisiana.
interesting points: The object was pie-shaped and made of cast aluminum alloy, The exterior was covered with a sooty substance while the interior shone silvery-gray, Multiple witnesses reported hearing a sharp explosion followed by a whirring sound, One patrolman did not see the object until it struck the pavement, The object was collected and later analyzed by OSI agents.
